channel.title: Tech Note on Emily's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Note on Emily's Blog

item.title: How do I set up my own website (1)
item.description: I always had the idea to create a personal website. It wasn’t until I moved to Norway last year that I got to thinking. What did I figure out? The niche of the website The name of the website How the website is set up The niche of the website The original idea is to begin with the service But without the “core”, where did you get the service?
